expo.name: Momma B's Scanner
expo.description: Scan barcodes to track pantry inventory and manage your kitchen

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan product barcodes and expiration dates for kitchen inventory management.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app may access your photo library to scan barcodes from images.
infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This app requires local network access to connect to the development server for live updates during development.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app does not access your location. This permission is required by a third-party library.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app does not access your location. This permission is required by a third-party library.

plugins.cameraPermissionText: Scanner needs camera access for barcode and expiration date scanning
